Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client.NetworkHandler

Class NetInterface

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.NetworkHandler.NetInterface
public class NetInterface
extends java.lang.Object
this class represents the Client side communication center.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Builder builder1
    represents the first worker on the board.
    private Builder builder2
    represents the second worker on the board.
    private ClientController clientController
    represent the Controller in the Client side.
    private Square firstSquare
    represent the first square in which the player can move or an other player has moved.
    private Moves moves
    represent the moves that a player can make and give back to the server, and the other way around, meaning the moves performed by other players send by the server.
    private java.util.ArrayList<Square> moves1
    represents the moves associated to the first worker.
    private java.util.ArrayList<Square> moves2
    represents the moves associated to the second worker.
    private Square secondSquare
    represent the second square in which the player can move or an other player has moved.

    • getMoves

      method used during the game to show the player what possibility has to choose and wait for the choice
      Parameters:
      socket - is the Server socket.
      Returns:
      the move chosen by the player depending on the phase of the game
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • stringToFullSquare

      private Square stringToFullSquare​(java.lang.String[] square2)
      Converts a String to a Square including the "value" and "level" attributes.
      Parameters:
      square2 - is a String[] formatted as "x,y:level,value".
      Returns:
      the full Square with the attributes.

      converts a Square object to a String containing the coordinates
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • stringToBuilder

      public Builder stringToBuilder​(java.lang.String string)
      converts back a string with the coordinates of the position of a builder to a builder object usable by the controller.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a builder object.

    • stringToBool

      public java.lang.Boolean stringToBool​(java.lang.String string)
      reads an integer from a string a converts it to a boolean. '0' is false '1' is true.
      Parameters:
      string - is the string from where to read
      Returns:
      true if the number in the string is '1', false if it is '0'.

    • stringToSquare

      public Square stringToSquare​(java.lang.String string)
      converts a string containing coordinates x and y separated by "," to a Square with x and y coordinates.
      Parameters:
      string - is the string that contains the coordinates
      Returns:
      a Square with x and y coordinates and all the other values set to 0.

    • stringToArrayListSquare

      public java.util.ArrayList<Square> stringToArrayListSquare​(java.lang.String value)
      converts a string containing the coordinates of an indefinite number of squares to an Arraylist with those Squares.
      Parameters:
      value - is the Arraylist formatted as x and y coordinates separated by "," and Squares separated by ":".
      Returns:
      the ArrayList of Squares.

    • booleanToString

      public java.lang.String booleanToString​(java.lang.Boolean isDome)
      is used to set the message to signal that the player can also build a dome.
      Parameters:
      isDome - if is true the player has the possibility to build a dome.
      Returns:
      String:"1" if isDome is tru, String:"0" if the boolean is false.

    • stringToCard

      public Card stringToCard​(java.lang.String string)
      converts a String containing the name and description of a card to a card object.
      Parameters:
      string - a string containing name and description of a card separated by "_".
      Returns:
      the card object with name and description set.
